description: Everyone loves "2-for-1" deals, so you're gonna go crazy for the 3-in-1 Ramble Component Jacket. A stretchy, breathable Polartec® fleece zips right into your waterproof, seam-taped shell for an adaptable jacket-wearing experience. Rainy spring shower? Go with the shell. Cool, breezy fall hike? Rock the fleece solo. Freshly powdered winter day on the slopes? Go big and wear both. This is a must-have for your trail or commuter pack so you're ready for almost anything the sky sends your way.
name: Marmot Ramble Component Jacket - Mens
